content.detailedDescription: Around 6:30 pm, on friday, november 14th, 2008, my husband and i were having dinner out on our deck in calabasas,ca which overlooks the san fernando valley. we observed a very large, silent, v shaped craft that had red flashing lights around its perimeter. it was moving south to north. since we live in a home which has a hilltop view, we are accustomed to watching various aircraft nightly. this was nothing like we have seen before. we called our 13 yr old son, and his friend, and together, we watched the craft as it flew over the valley.
content.summary: Huge v shaped, with red flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Low in the sky, lights similar to standard aircraft from a distance, but as i approached closer on i-205 @ 65 miles per hour, i realized it was too big to be a plane or helicopter.  i was northbound and the object was low, and to the east. 
it may have been circular, but what i saw was a half-circle of lights and the object was tipped at an angle.  was moving but slowly heading south.

i was stunned.  tried to see if other cars were slowing down to look, but my group was travelling too fast to be breaking. i didn't see any tail lights ahead of me, but the freeway was pretty crowded.  someone else had to have seen it.
content.summary: Half circle of white string of lights with one blue, one red.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 6:15 am we were standing out side loadeing a trailer when i just happen to look north west lokking to the city of st louis when i saw a black odject it looked like it was real high up in the air it was moving fast it came directly over the top of us both my co worker at first thought it was a ballon but it was moving way to fast to be a ballon when it got directly over us we saw the shape of a sphire with a cone like front on it i saw a program on the travel channel that discribed the same looking object from a while back it was gone just as fast as we saw it it traveled in a south dir
content.summary: Myself and another co worker saw the same shape come over the top of us.

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed a craft that seemed to hover in one spot, with a white light that pulsed in and out. after staying in one spot for roughly two minutes, it darted off to my left at incredible speeds. it later vanished into the horizon.

at 6:52 pm, two more craft fitting the description above were spotted. two lights were visible. the craft took off again at incredible speeds separate of each other, indicating they were not connected.

at 7:00 pm, an additional craft was spotted fitting the description of the three separate above. it vanished within 15 seconds.
content.summary: Hovering craft, unknown shape

content.detailedDescription: The day before the 2004 air force academy graduation, i was walking my dog in a field behind my house.  i noticed that everything became oddly silent, i could not longer here traffic or crickets.  after a few seconds of looking around i looked up and saw an equilateral triangle not more that 25 feet above me.  it was approximately 10 to 20 feet in length and there were lights at each corner of the triangle.  the lights were more of a glow-in-the-dark light and not at all like a headlight.  after a few seconds of silently drifting overhead like a kite, it smoothly angled up 90 degrees and accelerated directly upward, all without a sound.  for the last couple of years i believed what i saw was an aircraft like the stealth bomber, especially since president bush was addressing the air force academy graduation the next day but the size and maneuvering of the triangle didn't quite match what i would expect from a plane.  it was too small, too close to the ground and i have never seen anything angle up and accelerate that quickly and silently before.  the timing was also odd, based on the sound dampening effect, i believed it hovered directly overhead for a minute and flew away immediately after i spotted it.  i didn't observe any odd behavior from my dog, but she was about a hundred feet away from me at the time.
content.summary: A triangular craft appeared the day before the 2004 air force academy graduation

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the second floor balcony of a two story home in paradise valley, az looking north at approximately 9:00 pm.  a commercial airliner passed directly overhead traveling in a southwest direction toward sky harbor international airport.  

approximately 20 seconds after the airliner passes out of sight, a streak of light catches my eye just to the northwest.  the object was a bullet-shaped ufo traveling northwest at a constant altitude of approximately 1000 to 2000 feet and for a distance of 1/2 mile to 1 mile before disappearing.   there was a minor cloud cover on thursday evening, and it was well below that. the ufo was observed within a distance of 1/4 to 1/2 of a mile.

the incident was somewhat similar to a shooting star except for these observations:

   1.  the incident lasted much longer than a shooting star.
   2.  the object traveled below the cloud cover which i estimate being at 10,000 to 15,000 feet.
   3.  the object was unlike any known human craft.
   4.  the object was much closer than a shooting star - roughly as close as a helicopter would fly overhead.
   5.  the object had no signs of or any type of known propulsion system.
   6.  the craft was dead silent.  no noise or disturbance whatsoever generated by any type of propulsion system.
   7.  the shape of the object was not of any known manmade craft.
   8.  the shape of the object was unlike common ufo sightings that depict a saucer shaped object.  the craft was small.  seemed to look just like a small bullet-shaped cockpit with a "tail".  similar to shape of a single sperm cell with an illuminated cockpit.
   9.  the craft traveled at a speed much slower than a shooting star but still faster than any known manmade craft.  i estimate the speed at mach 2 to mach 3.  

i am a pilot and can identify all known manmade aircraft types - private, commercial, and military.  thank you for your time.
content.summary: Bullet-shaped ufo streaks across sky in paradise valley arizona.

content.detailedDescription: Outside in front yard daytime i looked up at sky watching a plane fly by when i saw an egg shaped object yellowish brown in color coming from the direction of macdill afb. at first i thought it was a balloon about six feet in diameter because it was completely silent about five hundred feet up and about five hundred feet east of my location but it was moving too fast for a balloon and when it abruptly made a ninety degree turn and accelerated i knew it was no balloon.It was amazing how quickly it speeded up never changing altitude only direction and was in view about ten seconds total before trees blocked my sight.I have lived near the macdill afb about a quater mile from main gate my entire life and i have seen every airplane the military admits to having but i have never seen anything like this object.
content.summary: Silent egg shaped object changed direction ninety degree turn.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside feeding my dogs and getting them some water
in their can.  i was watching them for a minute and looked up standing
on my concrete porch.  i saw this silvery white line, like the ones that
they shine up in the sky to adverise a store's opening.  only this one was
partly in the sky and above the ground.  it was slanted like when 
someone draws a white line, but the line was the size of the objects. i thought how weird as i saw it with naked eye.  than i went inside got my binoculars and peered thru them.  i saw the most incredible sight - one shiny sparkling light just sparkled back and fro, pulsating,a third of the way thru the top line and the other sparking sparkle was about a block down sparkled back at it and the white line extended on.

 it was if both of them were sparkling at each other the same time and
the one on the bottom, there was still a line below it, it was as if
both lights were on this strand of white light suspended in space.  i
watched it for a good five minutes or so and than all a sudden the line
just dropped swiftly with both lights still intact, almost like a smooth
piece of thread but this was a heavier bigger thread the size of the 
sparkles and it just floated every so smoothly all the way down until
it disappeared behind a clump of trees.  at this point, i couldn't see
because the trees and surrounding landscape covered everything.  it was
so beautiful.  i have never seen such a display.  it was almost as if
these two round sparkles were magnetized to each other.  i could not
understand how both of them could stand upside down in space one in
front of the other, sparkle at each other at the same time and than
slowly everything white line and sparkles all float down at the same
time.  i called the faa, today and they had nothing in the skies.  i
called and the police came out and went to check.  i drew a picture and
left it at the police dept.  
   i do not believe those objects were planes, satellites or etc.
from here.  they were too way out, like nothing i've seen before.
i just felt after viewing this beautiful sight, than our technology
here on this earth can't ever compare to whoever is visiting us.
because these were some beautiful objects.
   also, i believe other people like maybe a pilot or too saw it too.
maybe, they are afraid to speak out.  i don't know but there was 
a plane close by and i did recognize that.  i don't know why
no one else reported it but me.
   if we are being visited by out of this world folks, than we
should have the guts to speak out and say i say so and so.  what
we could learn from our out of this world friends might help our
technology to advance.  who knows what they might want to teach us,
who knows?
content.summary: 2 glimmery silver shinning like sparkles about a block apart.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness, d'ann wheeler was visiting her friend, who lives south of hico, tx.
they were outside the friend home and looking at the stars. it was a clear night. all of a sudden 6 orange lights, about the size of a baseball, just blinked on. there were two vertical rows of three lights each. they did not blink on or off, but the entire pattern rotated to the right, maybe 10-15 degrees. the lights did not seem to move, it just hovered. the lights were about 60 degrees above the horizon and maybe 1.5 miles from the witness. the lights appeared in the west and were last seen in the west. the witness also said that there were military jets in the area before the lights were spotted
and the jets, maybe f-16's, were in the area during and after the lights blinked off. she said that the jets were so high in the sky that she couldn't hear them. 

the lights were visible for about2-3 minutes, then the jets headed towards the lights, which were still hovering, then the lights just blinked out and weren't seen again. the jets stayed in the area and flying around as if they were looking for something.
content.summary: Sighted 6 orange lights in the sky two vertical columns of 3 lights each

content.detailedDescription:
While driving south on a dirt road aproxamently 3 miles west of burlington, i observed a very large aircraft that appeared manmade flying very slowley at an extreme low altitude. it was flying in a west-northwest direction and passed over the road directly in front of me. the craft appeared to be a jet engine design though it produced no visible exhaust or flame. it was also completely silent, and i was close enough that i should have heard an idleing engine or something. it was moving very slow, maybe 15 mph. it appeared to be maintaining a steady altitude. it was larger than a standard american fighter jet. the front end was long and round. the wings appeared to be set back towards the back of the fuselage. the color appeared to be a black or dark green. the overall styling looked vietnam era or older. this is a rural area and the only low flying aircraft are usually crop dusters.
the weather was cool and very windy, but sunny.
content.summary: Bizzar aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I am an automotive technician. i was at work working on a vehicle on the south side of the shop. i walked to the rear of the vehicle and i noticed out of the corner of my eye a bright reflection from something in the southern sky. the reflection was bright enough to catch my attention. i have worked in the same place for nearly seven years and have never seen anything like what i saw before. i immediatly stopped what i was doing and walked to the door entrance to get a better look. what i saw was disc shaped and metallic and was slightly fluttering up and down and side to side in one spot. the sun relection was extremely bright and it reflected off the entire object. there was no shadow visible on the object. at first i thought that it must be a plane or a hellicopter but as i got a better look i could make out the shape of the object as disc or saucer shaped. i suddenly became aware that i was looking at something unique and i called to one of my co-workers to come and see what i was looking at. i continued to watch the object as my co-worker made his way to my location. by the time he got to me the object began to rapidly move directly south away from my vantage point getting smaller and smaller until it just vanished. i would guess the distance from myself to the object to be maybe a mile to two miles. the amount of time it took from hovering until it disappeared was maybe five seconds. the total time i observed the object was about two to three minutes.
content.summary: I saw a disc shaped object appox. 1 to 2 miles away hovering low on the south horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Their son in wolfboro, nh telephoned and told them to look in the direction of the big dipper for lights that he and his son had observed the previous night on their way home from maine.  at first nothing was seen but then 4 or 5 bright lights turned on only to fade away.  this repeated every 10-15 seconds never moving from their original position.  their daughter joined them and this brought to 3 the number of witnesses at this location.  both women used binoculars but the light was too bright to make out any detail.  the number of times the lights turned on/off was not stated.  the mother is n avid photographer with 3 cameras but she could not tear herself away to get one.
content.summary: A row of 4 or 5 bright lights "turning on" then fading, then repeating every 10-15 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? 1. i was leaving work around 27 aug 08 -12:25am- i was going home to evacuating from hurricane gustav.
2. what made you first notice the object?  i notice the object as i was at the top of the over pass going over highway 45. the object was in the middle of my windshield. i slowed down a looked at this object- it was about 12 to 14 feet above dixie farm rd.  i looked for cables or something that it could be hanging from but nothing it was stationary in sky on its own.  i drove under it and kept going.  i looked in my rear view mirror and it was still there, i know, i was not the only one that saw this object. the sky was clear ������blue bird day���, something came over me- i carry a camera with me all the time, which, i use with my job.  it���s funny, i never thought about stopping and calling 911 or taking a photo of the object.  
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?  when i first saw this object, it looked like a camera or scanner- the dark windows were the first that caught my eyes.  i heard about ufo probes before an when i got home i told my wife about what i saw and sky was so clear it would have made a great clear photo��� 
4. describe the object and its actions and motions. the object was stationary and didn���t move any direction.  
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.  like i said up in paragraph --- i felt calm, and kept driving down the road.  i don���t understand still to this day ���why i didn���t stop and took photos of this object that i saw get some witness. 
6. how did you lose sight of the object? i lost sight of the object the last time; i saw it in my rear view mirror as i drove down the road.  it���s funny; i kept thinking about it all the way home and never turned around and went back��� i saw this video the weekend after my sighting and the same probe showed up on this video.
content.summary: Vertical cylinder object  (probe)  2-3 foot long --12 to 14 feet above the four lane road, notice object in the center of my windshield as i came over the top of the overpass going over hwy-45  going home from work,,,to evacuate for hurrucan gustav

content.detailedDescription: There was a series of lights in a short event.  a ball of gold/copper light with glowing sphere around it about the size of a dime if held at arms length.  light faded out and came back on within 1-2 seconds then moved in sequence to the left and diagonally down.  movements to the left every 1-2 seconds fading on/off all the time.  the 5th time it came back on, it was behind a tree line on a mt. top but i could still make out the glow behind the sticks.  rapidly, another ball of light appeared far off to the right of where the first ball appeared.  then it multiplied 1x, 2x,3x,5x, from its center to both left and right each time it went on/off until all 5 balls of light vanished like someone turned off a switch.  in the background of space i also noticed tiny rapidly moving strobes 2 or 3, moving like bees in the sky.  just seemed like these objects could have been launched these lights in a sequence.  other people in nearby towns also saw them.
content.summary: Mystery balls of light in western sky of white mts, nh

content.detailedDescription: A buddy and i were shooting the breeze around a fire late in the evening when a white-bluish light hit us.  we looked to see where it was coming from. we looked up just above the treeline and saw the light coming from what i can only assume the center of the source.  the source of light was circular in shape with smaller lights encircled around it.  on the left and right hand side of the main light was an orange light which seemed indirect as in not aimed downward as opposed to the main light source.  the main light source kept shooting the bright light down to the ground as if scanning (but not moving around).  there was absolutely no sound from it.  it came towards us for a split second, did an almost 180 degree turn then it was gone (high speed exit).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two adults males sitting around a fire at 0240hrs when a white-bluish light hit them

content.detailedDescription: A few months ago (may) i stopped on a scenic road in lebanon (nh)to take a few pictures of my car.  i didn't see or hear anything and was only stopped for a few minutes.  when i got home and uploaded the pictures to my computer i instantly noticed something wasn't quite right.   there was a black and silver object somewhere between 5,00 and 10,000 feet up, flying at almost a 45 degree angle.  although its very small in the picture you can tell its not a plane.  in the background you can see another object about a mile or two away.  in another picture that was taken about a minute after you can't see anything until you zoom in, then it appears.  the object had moved over a mile in less than a minute and had leveled out.  i thought about calling the airport and the police station to see if they had any other reports that day, but decided against it figuring i would be added on to a list of crazy people.
content.summary: Took photo of his car, did not see object until photos uploaded to computer

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pics of the geese over head and never seen these flying over . wondering if these are ufos? 
thank you !
karen
content.summary: Taking pics of geese.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of the geese flying over and these turned up in pic s mayb  ufo? mayb not,   wt do u think?
thank you!
karen
content.summary: Just taking pics of the geese.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were on our driveway, i was facing west and he was facing south. i saw around 20 red/orange lights appear over our tree line to the west, moving from west to east. we both started to run across our field towards them, and they changed formation and began to move west. i called my 19 year old son on my cell phone at 7:37 who was in the house to come outside to see these incredible lights. by the time he arrived in our field, there were approximately 10 lights, which were moving to the west, northwest. we remained outside until the last of the lights moved to the west/northwest.

my intitial reaction was that it was a fleet of aircraft of some type, there were so many and they were approaching rapidly. i honestly thought it was an invasion of some sort. i have never seen any types of lights like these in my life. we have lived near the dfw airport for 14 years, and these were unlike any lights or aircraft i have ever seen. there were at least 2 aircraft that were approaching for landing at dfw.

approximately 10-15 minutes after the event, at least 2 large military helicopters flew directly over our house and fields.
content.summary: Approximately 20 red/orange lights in semi circular formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I usually tag along with my mom when she brings my dad to work over in kentucky and i almost always sit behind the passenger seat with my digital camcorder taking pictures of the sky, and while my mom drove along the freeway going toward hebron kentucky we pass open fields that haven't been developed yet and the sky was nice and clear with no clouds and i took these two snapshots one after another, as you can see the reflection of the inside of the car and the camcorder but i did not realize what was on the photo's until i looked over them. i took many more photo's that day but these two are the only ones with objects in them. 

on another occasion after my mom already dropped my father off at work and we were on our way home i snapped this 3rd photo on a mildly cloudy day from directly out of the open passenger side window, the first two mentioned above were taken on july, 13th of 08 and the last one was taken on october 18th of 08. neither of the photo's were visible my the naked eye, only after i went though my pictures.
content.summary: Taken from inside my moms  van on a clear day going into kentucky

content.detailedDescription: At about 7:30 p.M. on 11/12/08 i was outside my balcony and a green circle of light caught my eye.  it looked like it was falling from the sky.  my reaction was what the heck is this and then i wished i had had my camera.  i only saw it for about 15 seconds as there is a church across the street from my balcony and i lost site of it behind the church.  then on 11/13/08 at approximatley 8:45 a.M. i was listening to the radio and people were calling into the station saying they had seen the same thing.
content.summary: Green circle of light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: No tail on the object  i felt something in my heart that said look up and it happened  a huge  ball of light flew over at such a high rate of speed i notice it bend as it flew like it was circling the earth something was controlling it.I was on smithsation road heading west to the light of 208 right beside the blooms  it was know as foodlion at that time.My house is only 2 to 3 miles away heading south on rt 208. about 6 yrs later i ran into a young guy how said he had seen the same thing i did on smithsation road past deerfield subdivision he said a large group of people seen it to they were at a school playing sports when it was seen. what made me belive it was a ufo is my mom was outside trying to see it as well. do to a report over her scanner saying it was called in flying over a base north of were i stay at .  the base is call quntico i belive.
content.summary: Ball of light  3 times bigger then a shotting  star  flew over head  west when i got home mom was standing outside  i asked why she said balls of light were reported over marine base near by.

content.detailedDescription: I have been taking photos of these events for 3 years now and have roughly 250 ohotos at diffent months ,years,dates all showing the same pattern.The police always call it a firebasll on scanner and people that stop at alliance gov. airport to watch these objects take off somehow are hit with a microwave new defense system that enables them and makes them unconsianse. the scanner always says male or female consciense and breathing then medics pick up the onlookers still passed out and then thier vehicals are towed away. the gov. is using live residents as test rats for thier experimental non- killing ufo ray machine and someone should contact me to see my photos that are 100% real.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,  Diamond,  Fireball,  Flash,  Star-like,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Red,blue,white twinkle then rotating brite yellow to orange then extrem white

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling southbound on i35 about five miles outside of des moines. when i saw flashing lights in the sky. at first i thought it was a helicopter, but the closer i got to the object the more clear it became to me and my cousin that it was not a aircraft that we have ever seen. i know aircraft having served seven years in the us army and having a brother that flies apache helicopters. above the northbound lane hovering maybe 75 to 100 feet above the tree line was a triangle shaped craft with white lights at 3 points of the triangle with red lights scatering the bottom of the craft. in the center was a big white light that resembled a spot light. the lights all flashed in a completely random fashion. after hovering for a few minutes the craft turned vertical and began to fly west at a high rate of speed. my cousin tried to snap a picture with his cell phone but by the time he got the camera up the object was already several miles away. i have never seen anything like it before and the vision is seared into my mind.
content.summary: Triangle ufo over interstate

content.detailedDescription:
At 1:55 a.M. a co-worker and i went outside to smoke. as we were smoking i was facing west and he was facing me. we were talking about something when i saw a bright orange-yellow sphere break through the clouds and shoot towards the earth.
i yelled out "holy s@#t!!" and pointed directly at the object. when i did this my co-worker instantly spun around to see what i was pointing out. almost instantly he yelled out "holy s@#t!!" just as i had done.
the object was heading almost straight towards the ground, but at a slight angle, and it was going faster than any airplane or helicopter i have ever seen. it actually appeared to be accelerating the entire way down. i looked for any flashing navigation lights but there were none. it was just a solid orange-yellow sphere,no tail, not pulsating or anything of the sort. i am pretty sure that the object was between myself and the mountain range by tooele, but there is a chance i'm mistaken about that fact(it may have been behind the mountains). the reason i'm almost positive it was in front of the mountains is because of how far i was able to follow the object before it dissapeared. if it were behind the mountains i would have lost sight of it a lot sooner. at the speed it was traveling there is no way any conventional aircraft would have been able to make this manuever without hitting the ground, but there was no explosion or sound at all. that is when the object left my field of view.
i then asked my co-worker if he saw what i saw and he confirmed that what he saw was no conventional aircraft. he and i both used the term ufo simultaneously. after the sighting we were both too excited to say anything, we just ran to where we thought we might be able to get another look of the craft and stood there stairing for about ten more minutes. after we were fairly certain it wasn't going to make another appearance we went back inside and i instantly took notes of the time, and details of what we saw. 
i live in an area that is very heavy with air traffic so i know the behaviors of airplanes...And this was no airplane.
content.summary: Facing tooele i saw something flying extremely fast towards the ground

content.detailedDescription:
Okay...
i developed a roll of 35mm film, i looked through everything paid no attention. went home, looked through them...And started to notice things.
the first photograph was at my girlfriend at the time, and after the curious photos, concrete smashing of a medium in the road.
there are two photos which i have no memory of what so ever.
[see 'light']
since i have looked into the photos, things have been happening to me.
a year after wards, i had extracted two metallic objects from my body.
the first was with the help of a women i was with and a pair of tweezers in my tear duct.
it was long, skinny, had a few barbs and crooks at the end...It has since seemed to dissipate.
and the other from my left middle finger in the center joint.
i have a red spot that will not go away now from the area from which i pulled it out.
that piece has turned into smaller pieces.
waking up with marks, burned in scars, memories of places..Faces at night, my hair standing up on end when i walk in my house at night.
back when i had a car, back when all this happened...I worked at this coffee shop, across town.
when i would exit the freeways on my way home, i had noticed one dark blue car following me at some length.
i never went home, drove around, the car behind me...Then the car went away.
----
that was years ago
now...Well, recently, i have been waking up with scary marks, hole like bruising.
my life still is mine, though...Things have changed, not sure for the better, or not.
everything has just changed as a whole entity.
i have written everything that i not only can remember, but what has been happening to me for the past four years.
my feelings about all this range from comfortable to extreme terror.
i have became unsettled, i mean the feeling i have a lot of the time.
a feeling of disconnection and restlessness.
content.summary: Four orbed object; i have no memory [except a photograph].

content.detailedDescription: My wife, three daughters and a friend were out on our driveway talking at approximately 10:15 pm. the conversation was centered around motorcycles. i noticed my wife looking up toward the north. she said: "do you guys see that?" we looked up and witnessed three lights in a triangular formation approximately 500 feet off the ground moving slowly in our direction. since all i could see were the three lights, i assumed it was a helicopter as there are regular military exercises launched from out small municipal airport. after relaying my assumption to my wife, i continued talking with my friend. at that point my wife touched my arm and said: "what's it doing now?"  we all looked up and watched as it began to glow bright orange in the center and then drop something toward the ground. the dropped object glowed with the same intensity, but as it drew closer to the ground, it either went dark or possibly dissipated entirely. this happened 3 more times, i told my wife to go get the camera.  when the object neared the point of being directly over us, it looked to me as though it just dissapeared. when i stated this, my friend corrected me and said: "no, it's lights are just off". at that point i could make out the dark triangular shape in the sky as it passed over our house. when we went to the other side of the house, it could no longer be seen.
content.summary: Limited sighting. 3 lights forming a triangular shape. silent.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my mothers backyard with some family members having a bar-b-que on july 6, 2008. a few cousins and myself were sitting around eating while talking. i was facing the back of my mothers yard when i noticed a orangish-yellow light move out from behind the tops of a tree. it had no shape other than being a light. i wasn't sure if it were some sort of firework. so i watched it for a few seconds. the light moved along the street it was above and seemed to have turned at the intersection. there was no wind to explain its odd movement. after a few shocked seconds i told my cousins about it. they all sort of laughed about it but i told them it was still there. they turned and seen it as well. we watched the light travel down the road it turned on until it vanished from sight. we all were talking about it for a few minutes when i noticed a second light appear about the same place as i seen the first. the second light followed the same course as the first. the second light had me stumped so i walked to the back fence of the yard to try to get a better look. again the second shape had no shape other than a light. in shape i mean no body like a plane or such. just a bright light. it was daylight out so it was bright enough to stand out in daylight. i again watched the light travel until it vanished from sight. due to distance i would think since i didn't see it go up or down. several times i've thought maybe it was those parachutes with the little flares on them you shoot off around the 4 of july. only things that keep me from believing that is there was no wind and they turned at the intersection at a right angle.

i had a second (or third if you count the first as two.) sighting on october 25, 2008. my girl-friend, my daughter, nephew, and i were coming home from a birthday party (around 8 p.M.). we had just turned off holt road onto morris street heading west. we went about a block to a block and a half when i looked out the car window (passenger side window.)and noticed a bright redish-orange light about 100 to 150 feet in the air. i told my girl-friend to look at it. we passed it up so i only got to see it for a few seconds. if it moved it did so at a really slow rate of speed. it didn't seem to have moved at all from first seeing it until i lost it to the tree line. my girl-friend dropped me off at home and left to go to a family members house when she called me and told me there were now three of the lights where we seen the first. from the time we last seen the first light until she called me about the three lights was about 5 minutes.
content.summary: I saw two orangish-yellow lights in the sky. one was first seen then another followed a few minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: My mother, 15 year old neice, and i were taking my children around on the golf cart trick or treating by the golf course.  we were on barbara ave the golf course was to our backs.  i turned around to look at the kids and i looked up and saw this large object just as it went over the tree line.  i told my neice and my mom to look.  my daughter saw it when we pointed it out. i am unclear of the distance or really the shape of the object because the only thing we noticed were the lights.  the best way that i could describe them was they were in the shape of a pringle's potato chip or the brim of a cowboy hat but the lights were white and flowed kinda like trickling water.  we did not hear anything because it was high in the sky.  we did not watch it long because we saw the back part of it as it was going over the tree tops.  when the kids got back on the golf cart we drove down rebecca dr because it is more of an open area and less lighting.  but we never saw it any more.  i have no idea what it was but i know it was not a plane or helicopter.  my grandaddy said that it could have been a dirigible but the two shapes they have here in georgia are of a ball shape and a rocket shape.  this was not shaped like either.  i really did not have a reaction to it other than curiosity.  i just want to know what it was.  the uploaded file is a picture i downloaded from the internet but it's the best way that i can describe the shape.  the curved line above the bottom line in the picture is the exact shape.  i know it sounds crazy describing it this way but thats the best example i can find.
content.summary: It reminded me of a pringle's potato chip from the side.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down rt 117 in buxton maine talking on my cell phone to my girlfriend.It is a realy dark rd and its very country no airports or anything but trees and a few houses. i notice a huge thing coming from my left with 3 huge lights in the front. the bulbs lookied like they could be 6 ft or so in diamiter. this thing was only about 100 ft above the trees. i pulled over n got out of my car and tried to get a photo of it on my phone but i couldnt get the camera to turn on fast enough.  this thing had no sound at all hardly. very faint.As it got directly above me the 2 out side lights turned off n the middle one stayed on. i could see the beems from the lights through the fog or mist that was in the air n it traveled about 3-4 football fields distance infront of the thing flying. it flew very very slowly and kept going over me. i hung up with my girlfriend and called my mother to see if she could see it from her house in the next town over . she said she couldnt. so i called my uncle and he said he thought he could but in a distance. after a few min it disapeared behind the tree line and i could no longer see it. i have kept this to my self other than the few people that i told that night. then i heard about you and i thought i should tell u . the way i heard about u was on tv. also on a different show on tv you were on, i saw a re creation of the exact thing i saw. or atleast similar to what you recreated with extreamly close detail . i dont get on my email much but i do get on it.  i hope to hear from u and posibly figure this out. thank you very much. jason madara                                                                                        p.S. i forgot to mention i used to work for a major air line refuling pass jets and luggage and i know this wasnt any thing of that sort, it much much bigger. it scared me pretty good. i honestly did not have any clue what i was seeing. to this day i still think about it. and i still look to see if i will see it again and have not.
content.summary: Craft flew over me bright lights extremely quiet huge.
